department.dept_long_name: Department of the History of Science

course.title: Topics in the History of Psychoanalysis
course.description: An introduction to issues and concepts in psychoanalysis, considered clinically in cultural, historical, and contemporary contexts. Major texts, figures, and controversies from Freud to the present. The course will focus on conceptualizations of theory creation and change, and on research and writing strategies.
course.notes: Open to advanced undergraduates with permission of the instructor.
